author: Kevin O'Sullivan
title: Antibody testing key to assessing spread of Covid-19 in population
description: Rolling out effective test would give greater certainty about measures to end lockdown
content:
There are two critical phases to global efforts against Covid-19; flattening the curve as cases ratchet up, and then re-emerging from lockdown gradually once an infection peak has been negotiated. 
The differing strategies in each scenario are informed by tw… [+6070 chars]
